entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
